section.heading: Service of subpoena.
section.text: A subpoena issued by a Clerk of Superior Court under § 13-443 shall be served in compliance with § 11-942 and applicable rules of the Superior Court for the service of subpoenas.

annoGroup.heading: Editor's Notes
annoGroup.annotation: Uniform Law: This section is based upon § 4 of the Uniform Interstate Depositions and Discovery Act.
